title: Ultra-HD 4K60fps Mobile Camera Solution
key_features: Low Power Consumption: 1.7 W power consumption in a typical scenario for 4K x 2K (3840 x 2160)@60 fps H.265 encoding
4K@60 fps Codec : 4K x 2K (3840 x 2160)@60 fps or 1080p@240 fps H.265/H.264 encoding & decoding.
Multi-Sensor Inputs : Up to 5-sensor inputs, supporting panoramic cameras and UAVs
Hardware-based Multi-Channel Video Stitching : 2-channel 3K x 3K (3000 x 3000)@30 fps or 4-channel 1080p@30 fps stitching and recording
High-Speed Memory Interfaces: USB 3.0 high-speed interface
